example: My mother always gets a bit anxious if we don't arrive when we say we will.

meaning: biết chắc, xác định rõ ràng
example: The police have so far been unable to ascertain the cause of the explosion.
[ + (that) ] I assumed (that) you knew each other because you went to the same school.
The economy is growing at its fastest rate this decade.
Forensic scientists are examining the wreckage for clues about the cause of the explosion.

meaning: (v) làm thí nghiệm, (n) cuộc thí nghiệm
example: Some people believe that experiments on animals should be banned.
[ + to-infinitive ] It's her responsibility to ensure the project finishes on time.

meaning: giải, giải quyết, làm sáng tỏ

example: All managers and supervisors should be familiar with policies and procedures relating to equal employment opportunities.

meaning: có hệ thống, có phương pháp
example: They aim to systematically tackle the root causes of the disease.
